body: can you try the same transfer without encryption (if that's ok with you), to rule out whether it's a problem with the encryption app or a general problem ? (out of memory issues could cause unwanted side effects)
is this fixed? why have you closed this?

hi,

sorry, but i will keep using ubuntu one for file sync. i do not have the
time to follow up on this case.


nevertheless i intend to use owncloud for syncing contacts and calendar.

stefan
